// Weather Card component - Presentation Layer
import React from'react';import{useWeather}from'../../hooks/useWeather';import{Card,CardBody}from'../ui/Card';import Button from'../ui/Button';import Alert from'../ui/Alert';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeatherCard=()=>{const{weather,loading,error,refreshWeather,getWeatherIcon,formatTemperature,getWeatherDescription}=useWeather();if(loading&&!weather){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"weather-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner mx-auto mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u05D1\u05D8\u05E2\u05D9\u05E0\u05D4..."})]})});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Alert,{type:"error",className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\u05D4\u05D8\u05E2\u05D9\u05E0\u05D4 \u05E0\u05DB\u05E9\u05DC\u05D4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline",size:"sm",onClick:refreshWeather,className:"mt-2",children:"Try Again"})]});}if(!weather){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"weather-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardBody,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"weather-icon mb-2",children:getWeatherIcon(weather.icon)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"weather-temp",children:formatTemperature(weather.temperature)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"weather-description",children:weather.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"weather-location",children:weather.location})]})})});};export default WeatherCard;
